lines.text: I don't know, Madonna. It's getting harder and harder to keep a happy thought in my head when I putt.

Now, that's what I call a bloomin' good shot. This is more fun than a Sean Connery film festival. I never knew I could have such a bonny time playing Putt Putt. Me father and uncle always told me it was a bunch of fiddle-faddle.
Ah, how about a round of Putt Putt?
Smashing, that sounds like a bonny time.
"Don't tell me you're gonna start rapping bogus again, B Girl.
Hey, they're sellin' like hot cakes. Whatta you putting in those burgers?
Business is going great. A few more days like this and we'll be able to make the bank payment.
Y'know, you're right. Hey, let me try one of those Dino Burgers.
